name: @rainstormy/preset-eslint-tailwind
description: A predefined, opinionated ESLint configuration suitable for any web project with Tailwind CSS classes.
author: Steffen Diswal

dependencies.@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base: This ESLint preset ships with type definitions for ESLint presets and their configurable options.
dependencies.eslint-plugin-tailwindcss: This ESLint plugin covers Tailwind class strings in JSX components.

devDependencies.typescript: TypeScript is a statically typed programming language on top of JavaScript.

peerDependencies.eslint: ESLint is a peer dependency of `@rainstormy/preset-eslint-base`.
peerDependencies.tailwindcss: Tailwind CSS is a peer dependency of `eslint-plugin-tailwindcss`.
